docs.title: How to use Sealfie?
docs.subtitle: Once registered in our systems, which is done by contacting us

stepstart.one: I need to validate a document linked to a transaction request.
stepstart.tree: I take a photo of the document, a selfie and add a message (option)
stepstart.biometric: I confirm with the biometric of my smartphone

docs.intersteps: The validation request is processed, we add additional certificates if available. The other members of the group receive notifications.

stepvalidate.one: Another person receive a validation request.
stepvalidate.two: She checks the photos and consistency of information.
stepvalidate.tree: It validates and adds a selfie.
stepvalidate.biometric: She confirms with the biometric of her smartphone

docs.completed: The applicant may verify that the right people have approved the request. Contact us for technical details and computer automation.
